data.title: Ibrahim Name Meaning in English & Urdu, Origin, Luck Number
data.meta_description: Ibrahim is a Muslim Arabic baby boy name. Its meaning is "Father Of A Multitude, Kind Father". Ibrahim name origin is Arabic. Write Ibrahim in Urdu, Hindi, Arabic, Bangla : ابراہیم, इब्राहिम, ابراھیم,إبراهيم, ইব্রাহিম., Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi
data.text:
Ibrahim Name Meaning in English

What does the name Ibrahim mean? What is the meaning of the name Ibrahim, lucky number, lucky stone, origin and religion.

Ibrahim (Arabic: إبراهيم‎‎, Ibrāhīm) is the Arabic name of the prophet and patriarch Abraham. He was God's messenger. It is a common first name and surname among Muslims and Arab Christians, a derivative of the name Abraham or Avram from Judaism and Christianity in the Middle East.

Ibrahim Name Meaning, Origin & Details

Meaning: Father of a multitude, Kind father Short Info: American President Abraham Lincoln was born in 1809. Details: Arabic form of Abraham, which is from the Hebrew avhamon, meaning "father of many". Gender: Boy Origin: Arabic Religion: Muslim Suitable for: Boys / Male / Guys Hardness: Medium hard to pronounce Uniqueness: It is a common name Short & Easy: Not very short Syllables: 7 Letters and 1 Words

Ibrahim Name Lucky Number 7

Ibrahim Name Numerology And Personality

Ibrahim has the numerology 7. They try and analyze as many things as possible and not just that but they also believe in spreading awareness about everything that they know. The meaning of this name is Father of a multitude, Kind father. They do not believe in keeping knowledge to themselves but spreading it.

People with numerology number 7 are more on the studious and knowledgeable side because they believe in studying everything that is present on this planet. The gender of this name Ibrahim is Boy.

They are also the ones believing in meditation because they want peace all around them and these people are also very understanding of the situations around them. They do not make a fuss out of any situation rather they try to solve it as much as possible.

Ibrahim Ethnicity Distribution

What we know about Ibrahim

There are a few names that surely leave an impact on your mind every time that you get to hear them. The name that we are going to be talking about today is one of those names. Not just that but the name that we are going to be discussing is also one of our favorite names too.

We are talking about the name Ibrahim today, which is a very famous name in the religion Islam. The name Ibrahim was one of the Prophet's names and that is what makes it an extremely special name for all Muslims.

If you do not know who Ibrahim was we will mention that too. Ibrahim was the messenger of Allah and Ibrahim is also known to be Abraham in Christianity. Abraham is just the English version of the Islamic Ibrahim name.

Now that you know the Islamic details of this name, we will get into Ibrahim's name meaning. The meaning of Ibrahim in Urdu and English is Father of the multitude. This name is really famous in both Islamic ways and also among Christians. This is basically a male name that cannot be used for females and is completely specified for that gender.

Talking about the popularity of this name it is a very common name and you will surely get to hear this name a lot around you. This is also a hard name and a long name. This name consists of about seven letters and is also a single word.

The next thing that people are often curious to know about is what the numerology of the name says. The numerology of the name Ibrahim is 7. This name’s numerology means that these people are slightly overthinkers. These are the people that are always intrigued and they also like to overanalyze everything too.

These people are also known to be critical thinkers and they also enjoy doing so. They are also keen to get knowledge and also spread it everywhere too.

Impact on the personality:

The name Ibrahim means father of the multitude so you will surely have these people being fatherly to everyone around them no matter what their age. These people are also very kind because of that and are loved by people around them too.

Not just that but because of the numerology the people with this name overthink everything and that surely makes for one bad habit. If these people stop overthinking and overanalyzing everything they will surely be more than just perfect.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: Has Ibrahim considered a good name or not?

Ans. Yes, Ibrahim surely is considered a very good name and people love to use it.

Q: What is the lucky number for the name Ibrahim?

Ans. The lucky number for the name Ibrahim is 7, just like the numerology.

Q: Are there any nicknames used for the name Ibrahim?

Ans. The nickname used for the name Ibrahim is Brahim.

Q: Is Ibrahim a female name?

Ans. No, Ibrahim is a male name 100% and cannot be used for females.

Q: Are the name Ibrahim, and Abraham the same or not?

Ans. Yes, the name Ibrahim and Abraham same. Ibrahim comes from Islam and Abraham comes from Christianity
